item.title: 复活节后美国申请失业救济人数跃升至二月份以来最高点
item.description: 在复活节后的一周内，美国失业救济金申请人数跃升至二月份以来的最高水平。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits jumped to the highest level since February during the week that followed Easter.】

item.title: 太阳能发电激增迫使核电削减，法国电力大幅下滑
item.description: 法国的电力价格再次跌破零点，因为太阳能席卷了电网，迫使该国庞大的核电机组削减产量。【原文：French power prices again tumbled below zero as solar energy swamped the grid, forcing the country’s vast nuclear fleet to slash output.】

item.title: 在努力吸引新玩家的同时，Roblox 每日用户数量猛增 26
item.description: 流行的视频游戏平台 Roblox 公司报告称，由于努力吸引新玩家并让他们更长时间地使用该服务，第一季度的活跃用户数量增幅超过预期。【原文：Roblox Corp., the popular video-game platform, reported a larger-than-expected jump in active users for the first quarter, benefiting from efforts to attract new players and keep them using the service longer.】

item.title: 交易员全面预计英国央行今年将再减息四季度
item.description: 由于对美国经济疲软可能蔓延全球的担忧与日俱增，交易员们加大了对英国央行决策者加快降息步伐的押注。【原文：Traders boosted wagers on Bank of England policymakers speeding up the pace of interest-rate cuts as concerns grow that weakness in the US economy may spread globally.】

item.description:

item.description:

】

item.title: 皇家火柴人》制作商 Dream Games 获 CVC 领投的 25 亿美元融资
item.description: Dream Games 是一家制作智能手机游戏《皇家对战》的移动游戏工作室，该公司已通过债务和股权交易筹集了约 25 亿美元，私募股权公司 CVC Capital Partners 将成为其唯一的股权投资者。【原文：Dream Games, a mobile gaming studio that makes the Royal Match smartphone game, has raised about $2.5 billion in debt and equity in a deal that will make private equity firm CVC Capital Partners its sole equity investor.】

item.title: 特朗普制造混乱，外国基金看淡美国企业债券
item.description: 随着贸易战的升温，欧洲和亚洲的资金经理们有迹象表明，他们失去了向美国公司贷款的部分胃口，这对美国企业来说可能是一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：European and Asian money managers are showing signs of losing some of their appetite for lending to US companies as trade wars heat up, in a potentially worrying sign for corporate America.】

item.title: 西班牙和葡萄牙的停电事故表明有必要加大电网升级的力度
item.description:
要在本世纪中叶实现净零排放，必须在电力网络上投资超过 21 万亿美元，但各国的投资额却远远不够。【原文：

More than $21 trillion must be invested in electricity networks to reach net zero by midcentury, yet nations are coming up short.

】

item.title: Wayfair 第一季度利润超预期，股价飙升
item.description: 由于财报结果好于预期，Wayfair 公司的股价在盘前交易中最高上涨了 19%。【原文：Wayfair Inc.’s shares rose as much as 19% in premarket trading as its earnings results came in better than expected.】

item.title: 面对经济不确定性，扎克伯格全力推动人工智能投资
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）写道，马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）毫不气馁地认为，无论外部经济条件如何，人工智能都将推动他的公司向前发展。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner writes about Mark Zuckerberg’s undeterred enthusiasm that artificial intelligence will propel his company forward regardless of the outside economic conditions.】

item.title: 欧洲将测试特朗普讨论贸易问题的带宽
item.description: 距离美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的互惠关税生效还有 60 多天，与美国达成贸易协议的竞争正在扩大，不仅仅局限于亚洲的几个出口大国。【原文：With just over 60 days to go until President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs are set to snap into force, the race to do trade deals with the US is expanding beyond a few export powers in Asia.】

item.description: 丹麦计划拨出近 10 亿美元，为其商船队投保，以防发生战争或重大危机。【原文：Denmark plans to set aside almost $1 billion to insure its merchant fleet in the event of a war or major crisis.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产在清淡的五一交易中回落
item.description: 周四，新兴市场股市和货币在清淡的交易中走软，大多数市场因五一假期休市。【原文：Emerging market stocks and currencies weakened on Thursday in light trade, with most markets closed for May Day holidays.】

item.title: 耶伦警告特朗普加征关税后美国经济衰退风险 "大增
item.description: 珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）警告说，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）全面征收关税给金融市场、消费者和企业带来震荡之后，美国经济衰退的风险 "大幅上升"。【原文：Janet Yellen warned that the risk of a US recession has “gone way up” after Donald Trump’s sweeping tariffs rattled financial markets, consumers and businesses.】

item.title: 巴宝莉 17 年来首次获得花旗买入评级
item.description: 巴宝莉集团（Burberry Group Plc）的一位分析师自全球金融危机以来一直对这只陷入困境的奢侈品股票持中性评级，但自 2008 年以来首次转为正面评级。【原文：A Burberry Group Plc analyst who’s had a neutral rating on the struggling luxury-goods stock since the Global Financial Crisis has turned positive for the first time since 2008.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 ADQ 资产四年翻番后计划下一步行动
item.description:
酋长国最新成立的财富基金的增长速度超过了许多同行。高管们正在寻找利用这一势头的方法。【原文：

The emirate’s newest wealth fund is growing faster than many of its peers. Executives are now looking for ways to take advantage of that momentum.

】

item.title: Uber 为老年人推出更简洁的界面，抢先 Lyft 进入市场
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. launched a simpler version of its rideshare app to make it easier for older adults to get around, the latest move in its tit-for-tat rivalry with Lyft Inc., which plans to launch a similar feature later this year.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会安娜-戈麦斯为媒体辩护，与特朗普针锋相对
item.description:
她很快就会成为该委员会中唯一的民主党人，该委员会支持总统对媒体采取好斗的立场。【原文：

She’ll soon be the lone Democrat on the commission, which is supporting the president’s combative stance against the media.

】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司利润增长 753%，得益于威尔玛公司的一次性收益
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）领导的阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）公布的季度利润增长了 753%，这主要得益于与合资企业交易相关的一次性收益。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd., led by billionaire Gautam Adani, reported a 753% rise in quarterly profit, boosted by a one-time gain related to a joint venture deal.】

item.title: 与特朗普挂钩的稳定币被用于 MGX 的 20 亿美元 Binance 交易
item.description: 特朗普家族的去中心化金融项目--世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）表示，其新的稳定币被用于阿布扎比 MGX 对加密货币交易所 Binance 控股有限公司的 20 亿美元投资。【原文：World Liberty Financial, the Trump family’s decentralized finance project, said its new stablecoin was used for a $2 billion investment in crypto exchange Binance Holdings Ltd. by Abu Dhabi’s MGX.】

item.title: 关税动荡影响盈利周期，选股者陷入困境
item.description: 全球贸易忧虑正在刺激美国股市步调一致地波动，这让试图战胜本已变幻莫测的市场的选股人头疼不已。【原文：Global trade worries are spurring lockstep moves in US equities, a headache for stock pickers trying to beat an already unpredictable market.】

item.title: 以关税为焦点的财报测试为苹果混乱的一个月画上句号
item.description: 苹果公司股价在上个月因关税引发的历史性大跌中收复了大部分失地，但这并不意味着投资者就可以高枕无忧了。【原文：Apple Inc. shares have clawed back a good portion of the ground they lost in the historic tariff-induced selloff last month, but that doesn’t mean investors are in the clear.】

item.title: 西班牙 Cirsa 公司发行 PIK 债券，对风险偏好进行新一轮测试
item.description: 西班牙博彩公司 Cirsa 正计划发行新的实物支付拨动票据，这种票据允许发行人选择将利息支付推迟到最后到期日。【原文：Spanish gaming company Cirsa is planning to issue new payment-in-kind toggle notes, a type of debt that gives issuers the option to delay interest payments until the final maturity date.】

item.title: 马斯克称能源与环境部 "一定要 "审查美联储成本
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他正在考虑向美联储派遣他的政府效率团队，并以美联储华盛顿总部耗资巨大的翻修工程为例，说明政府可能存在浪费现象。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said he is considering sending his government efficiency team to the Federal Reserve, citing a costly renovation of the central bank’s Washington, DC, headquarters as an example of potential government waste.】

item.title: Palantir 的情报收集车被军队评为优胜产品
item.description: Palantir 科技公司为美国陆军设计的新型移动战场情报收集车和拖车被美国陆军领导人评为表现最佳的项目之一。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc.’s new mobile battlefield intelligence-gathering vehicle and trailer for the US Army is ranked by its leaders as among their top-performing programs, according to a new assessment by the service.】

item.title: 调查显示：消失的中国商品将冲击毫无准备的市场
item.description: MLIV Pulse 最新调查显示，来自中国的商品流通放缓凸显了关税给美国经济带来的风险，投资者将在未来几周内遭受冲击。【原文：Investors are in for a shock in the next few weeks as the slowing flow of goods from China underscores the risks tariffs bring to the US economy, the latest MLIV Pulse survey showed.】
